GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.14 to before v6.1.12
GSD.description:
net: USB: Fix wrong-direction WARNING in plusb.c

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.1.12 by commit 0d2cf3fae701646061e295815bb7588d2f3671cc, it was introduced in version v2.6.14 by commit 090ffa9d0e904e1ed0f86c84dcf20684a8ac1a5a. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net: USB: Fix wrong-direction WARNING in plusb.c
